class.name: System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener
class.summary: Directs tracing or debugging output to a TextWriter or to a Stream, such as Console.Out or FileStream.

constructor.name: TextWriterTraceListener
constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of the TextWriterTraceListener class with TextWriter as the output recipient.

constructor.name: TextWriterTraceListener(System.IO.Stream)
constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of the TextWriterTraceListener class, using the stream as the output recipient of the debugging and tracing output.
constructor.param: A Stream that represents the stream the TextWriterTraceListener writes to.
constructor.exception: The stream is a null reference.

constructor.name: TextWriterTraceListener(System.String)
constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of the TextWriterTraceListener class, using the file as the recipient of the debugging and tracing output.
constructor.param: The name of the file the TextWriterTraceListener writes to.

constructor.name: TextWriterTraceListener(System.IO.TextWriter)
constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of the TextWriterTraceListener class using the specified writer as the recipient of the tracing or debugging output.
constructor.param: A TextWriter that receives output from the TextWriterTraceListener.
constructor.exception: The writer is a null reference

constructor.name: TextWriterTraceListener(System.IO.Stream, System.String)
constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of the TextWriterTraceListener class with the specified name, using the stream as the recipient of the tracing or debugging output.
constructor.param: A Stream that represents the stream the TextWriterTraceListener writes to.
The name of the new instance.
constructor.exception: The stream is a null reference

constructor.name: TextWriterTraceListener(System.String, System.String)
constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of the TextWriterTraceListener class with the specified name, using the file as the recipient of the tracing or debugging output.
constructor.param: The name of the file the TextWriterTraceListener writes to.
The name of the new instance.
constructor.exception: The file is a null reference.

constructor.name: TextWriterTraceListener(System.IO.TextWriter, System.String)
constructor.summary: Initializes a new instance of the TextWriterTraceListener class with the specified name, using the specified writer as the recipient of the tracing or debugging output.
constructor.param: A TextWriter that receives the output from the TextWriterTraceListener.
The name of the new instance.
constructor.exception: The writer is a null reference.

property.name: Writer
property.summary: Gets or sets the writer that receives the debugging or tracing output.
property.value: A TextWriter that represents the writer that receives the tracing or debugging output.

method.name: WriteLine(System.String)
method.summary: Writes a message to this instance's Writer followed by a line terminator.

method.name: Write(System.String)
method.summary: Writes a message to this instance's Writer.

method.name: Flush
method.summary: Flushes the output buffer for the Writer.

method.name: Close
method.summary: Closes the Writer so that it no longer receives tracing or debugging output.
